sentences.en: ...a successful melange of music styles, from soul and rhythm and blues to rap.
sentences.cn: ...一个从灵乐、节奏、布鲁斯到说唱各种音乐风格的成功组合。

sentences.en: A rift trough along Mianxian - Lueyang ophiolitic melange belt was formed from Ordovician to Silurian.
sentences.cn: 奥陶纪—志留纪大致沿勉略构造带形成南秦岭裂陷槽.

sentences.en: Airy , grey melange yarns, that are very , very light.
sentences.cn: 轻盈的花纱是非常轻的.
自注 “ 一 ” 是: “ melangeabultere ”.

sentences.en: The evolution progress of the The Xijir Ulan tectonic melange belt is summarized primarily.
sentences.cn: 初步总结了西金乌兰蛇绿构造棍杂岩带的演化过程.

sentences.en: The resulting melange played to Zhang's strengths as a filmmaker.
sentences.cn: 出台的这种杂烩让电影制作人张艺谋的优势得以发挥.

sentences.en: Using dual - constant Kubelka - Munk theory for colour matching of melange fibres is discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了双常数库贝尔卡 - 芒克理论用于混色纤维配色.

words.tran_cn: 混合物；文学作品的杂集

trans.tran_cn: 混合物，大杂烩，杂乱的一群，混色纱
